revision.text: ==English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|en|yald}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|en|enm|yeld}}, from {{inh|en|ang|ġilde||valuable, of worth}}, from {{inh|en|gem-pro|*gildiz||valuable, valid, wholesome, precious}}, from {{der|en|ine-pro|*gʰeldʰ-||to pay for, repay}}. Cognate with {{cog|sco|yauld||active, strong, mighty}}, {{cog|non|gildr||of full worth, size, measure, or quality; full; complete; absolute; great}} (whence {{cog|is|gildur||valid, thick, prominent, important}}, {{cog|sv|gild||stout, of full size}}, {{cog|da|gild||brawny, of full size, fine}}. Related to {{l|en|yield}}. ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|er|more}} # {{lb|en|Now|_|chiefly|_|dialectal|Scotland}} [[vigorous|Vigorous]]; [[strong]]; [[healthy]]. # {{lb|en|Now|_|chiefly|_|dialectal|Scotland}} [[active|Active]]; [[sprightly]]; [[alert]]. # {{lb|en|Now|_|chiefly|_|dialectal|Scotland}} [[supple|Supple]]; active; [[athletic]]; [[nimble]]. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=adluy|Dulay|Dyula}}
